class.name: ByteToCharCp1143
class.javadoc:
A table to convert Cp1143 to Unicode. This converter differs from Cp278 is one code point, 0x5A, which changes from \u00A4 to \u20AC.
Alan Liu

method.name: getUnicode
method.comment: Change single code point with respect to parent. [Careful -- if the code point in question is >= 0x80, make sure you do the comparison like this: (byteIndex == (byte)0x??)]
